page.title: 02Industry
page.content:
With the closing of the local coal mines, only two small companies have come into the area to reduce the huge numbers of young unemployed.
1. Carden Casting Co. This company was set up in 1967 as part of the expansion program of a Slough company. Cardenden was chosen, firstly because the founder of the company was a Scotsman and secondly there was a good supply of unemployed manual labourers in the area. The company makes aluminium alloy castings(sand castings and gravity dye castings). Their products are sold to engineering and electronic related industrys. Of the workforce of about 20 half come from Cardenden and the rest from Kirkcaldy. At present the company is struggling to stay in business.
